title: FPS DROP SINCE NEXUS UPDATE
body:
Hello, Ever since this week update or Nexus my FPS is always below 30 sometimes it stays 21-19  and it hits 9. My usual FPS is 80-50 I can't land my skill shots thanks to this. My LOL is set to max settings and I always use XSPLIT TO record my games and still 50 to 80 FPS but this week its been really low. 

Thanks!

replies.body: Your game files might be having trouble rendering, and causing a lower fps.  With your computer doing so much processing, it's important to keep it tuned-up!  If you're still experiencing this issue, we have an [FPS Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide that can help make sure your computer is in shape, as well as work towards resolving the issue you're having.  Reach out if you come to any issues.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UZrqJfwQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-20T21:19:45.690+0000)
>
> Your game files might be having trouble rendering game files, 

I'm sure you mean the computer might be having trouble?
